Based on your interest in historical films, I'd highly recommend watching "Woman in Gold" or "Argo".

"Woman in Gold" is an inspiring true story about an elderly Jewish refugee who fights for the return of a family portrait stolen by the Nazis, featuring actors Elizabeth McGovern and Ryan Reynolds.

On the other hand, "Argo" is set during the U.S. hostage crisis in Iran and follows a CIA agent as he poses as a Hollywood producer to rescue six Americans. Ben Affleck brilliantly portrays the lead role in this gripping tale. Both films are sure to captivate you with their historical narratives!
